column4: I need help setting up remote access between host win and vbox ubuntu plz help
you need to be more specific than that.
depending on what you need there are different methods
i dont know any of them and therefor i need help
but if you can set your guest virtual machine settings to use Bridged Networking instead of the default "NAT" then you can treat the guest OS as if it were another machine on your local network
yes i done that and i can ping it, but i dunno wich programs to install to get it running
and what kind of access  do you want ?
you can try freenx, vnc or for single remote usage of apps, xming
ok can u help me setting up vnc?
not really i haven't used it. but i could help with freenx
how does freenx differ from vnc?
the stream is encrypted with ssl and i think there is more compression
if freenx is too hard for you maybe you can try : https://help.ubuntu.com/community/VNC/Servers
